    • addMovie

      public void addMovie(String Title, String Description, Entity.Constants.AGE_CLASSIFICATION Age, ArrayList<String> DirectorList, ArrayList<String> ActorList, ArrayList<String> GenreList, ArrayList<Entity.Review_Ratings> reviewList, LocalDate OpeningDate, LocalDate ClosingDate, Duration Duration)
      Function that adds movie.
      Parameters:
      Title - The movie's title.
      Description - The movie's description.
      Age - The movie's age restriction.
      DirectorList - List of directors
      ActorList - list of actors
      GenreList - list of genres
      reviewList - list of reviews
      OpeningDate - opening date of the movie
      ClosingDate - closing date of the movie
      Duration - duration of the movie
